sentence.Network_en: The fairy king and queen were contending over possession of the cat.
sentence.Network_cn: 仙王和仙后争着要这只猫.

sentence.Network_en: Our football team is contending with one from the next town for the championship.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的足球队正与邻镇的足球队争夺冠军.

sentence.Network_en: He was tiresome in contending for the value of his own labors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他老为他自己劳动的价值而争强斗胜,令人生厌.

An experienced lawyer has been asked arbitrate the contending parties ., 已经请了一位有经验的律师来为争辩双方调停.
contend 风流, contending 争先, contender 竞赛者
This course offers a critical analysis of contending theories of international relations ., 本课程对于争辩中的国际关系理论提供了批判性的分析.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... tendency n 倾向 contend v 竞争，争论 extend v 延展，扩张.
the boy contended that he saw a ghost ., 这个男孩硬说他看见了鬼.
抗_百度百科 ... （3）抗拒；拒绝[ defy;refuse] （4）匹敌，抗衡[ contend with] （5）举起[ raise].
挑拨性丑闻（The contender，美国）美国总统决定选择参议员Laine为副总统，这意味着美国即将有历史上的第一个女性副总统。

entry.def: If you have to contend with a problem or difficulty, you have to deal with it or overcome it.

example.ex: It is time, once again, to contend with racism...
example.tran: 又一次到了与种族主义战斗的时刻了。

example.ex: American businesses could soon have a new kind of lawsuit to contend with.
example.tran: 美国公司可能很快就要有一种新型的官司去应付了。

entry.def: If you contend that something is true, you state or argue that it is true.

example.ex: The government contends that he is fundamentalist...
example.tran: 政府认定他是原教旨主义者。

example.ex: 'You were just looking,' contends Samantha. 'I was the one doing all the work.'
example.tran: “你不过是看看而已。”萨曼莎争辩道，“什么活儿都是我来干。”

entry.def: If you contend with someone for something such as power, you compete with them to try to get it.

example.ex: ...the two main groups contending for power.
...with 10 UK construction yards contending with rivals from Norway, Holland, Italy and Spain.
example.tran: 10家英国建造厂与来自挪威、荷兰、意大利和西班牙的对手展开竞争

means.word_mean: 1. striving or struggling in rivalry or battle;

auth_sentence.content: I am not contending Titanic would not have sank.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am not contending Titanic would not have sank.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am not contending Titanic would not have sank.

auth_sentence.content: Halliburton, meanwhile, is contending with two new scandals.

auth_sentence.content: What in their research findings are you contending, Neal T?
